text: The 2015–16 Superleague Greece was the 80th season of top division football in Greece. The season started on 22 August 2015 and ended in May 2016. Olympiacos won their sixth consecutive title and 43rd overall. == Teams == * AEK Athens * Asteras Tripoli * Atromitos * Iraklis * AEL Kalloni * Levadiakos * Olympiacos * Panathinaikos * Panetolikos *
